short_summary: Temporary Help Services for the Department of National Defense. Level of Security Requirement: Secret
description: Temporary Help Services. A Request for Proposal to qualified suppliers generated from CPSS.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Title**
NPP – S4717197 - THS SA – One (1) 5.1 Computer Application Support-Senior. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Reference**
cb-317-89700749

**Amendment Number**
5

**Solicitation Number**
S4717197

**Publication Date**
2023-11-22

**Tender Closing Date**
2023-11-30

### Background
The Department of National Defense (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services. The requirement is open to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the streams and categories listed below:

* Stream: 5.1 Computer Application Support

A total of 15 supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Requirement Description
The DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, which involves providing senior-level computer application support services. The contractor must have a minimum security clearance of Secret.

### Tender Information

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense
* **Contact Information**: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help, CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca, 613-971-795

### Attachments
Tender notices and related documents can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24841/s4717197-method-1---rfp_0.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24841/s4717197-method-1---rfp%2800b.pdf

**Note:** Please verify all details and attachments before submitting your proposal, as all information may not be included in this notice.  We have not included the list of invited bidders as it took up too much space,, thus it has been left blank.  Sorry about that.  You can verify the list of bidders on the original document.

The original text was edited to make it shorter and more readable, with headings added above the sections. Grammar and punctuation were corrected to conform
